steps: step 4: Click on div  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/cm-env/workload'
step 7: Click on svg  -> Navigate to page 'home'
step 8: Click on button 'Edge Compute 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 11: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/storage'
step 14: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/snapshots'
step 15: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 16: Enter input value in input field
step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
